raw_response: {"answer_index": 3, "answer_text": "Gamma fiber", "confidence": 10, "reasoning": "Stretch fibers, specifically muscle spindles in striated muscle, are innervated by gamma motor neurons (gamma fibers). These fibers adjust the sensitivity of the muscle spindle to stretch. A delta fibers and C fibers are sensory fibers involved in pain and temperature transmission, not muscle spindle innervation."}
